name: Tipping Point (itch)
description:
Welcome Pilot in the future the year is 3049 and humanity is at brink of it's finial moment. the temperature is rising and there is no point of return. the last thing that humanity can do is to build a spaceship called project ark. 

You pilot must help them by giving them resources but also you must also help the people in 7 different cities.

Are you up for the task or will you perish like the rest.
find out in the game Tipping Point. 

Controls

WSDA control helicopter

E pickup and drop items

R Delete all items

Q build menu

M/N change Page of build menu

Space Build blueprint

I CIty information

ESC quit Game

BackSpace Close Information or BuildMenu
